feature.label: Treez
feature.description: Treez is a set of Eclipse plugins for the creation of generic tree based user interfaces. Visit http://sourceforge.net/projects/treez/
feature.copyright: Treez Treez is a set of Eclipse plugins for the creation of generic tree based user interfaces. Visit http://sourceforge.net/projects/treez/ Copyright (c) 2015 Stefan Eidelloth This offering is based on technology from the Eclipse Project. Visit http://www.eclipse.org This product includes software developed by Apache. Visit https://commons.apache.org/ This product includes software developed by Spring IO. Visit https://spring.io/
feature.license:
Treez Software User Agreement
June, 20, 2015
TREEZ
Treez is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0. A copy of the EPL is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html.
APPLICABLE LICENSES
Treez is built upon a number of other open source technologies and products. Here is a list of those products with links to their licenses:
Apache Commons (subset)
The plug-in is accompanied by a subset of Apache Commons, developed by the Apache Software Foundation. This plug-in includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.core plug-in: commons-exec-1.3.jar commons-logging-1.2.jar Your use of Apache Commons is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0 ("Apache License"). A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html. The source is available at the Apache Commons web site at http://commons.apache.org/dowloads.
Apache Log4j
The plug-in is accompanied by Log4j, developed by the Apache Software Foundation. This plug-in includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.core plug-in: log4j-1.2.5.jar Your use of Apache Commons is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0 ("Apache License"). A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html. The source is available at the Apache Log4j web site at http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/download.html.
Spring Expression Language (SpEL)
The plug-in is accompanied by the Spring Expression Language (SpEL) developed by Spring IO. This plug-in includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.core plug-in: spring-expression-4.1.6.RELEASE.jar spring-core-4.1.6.RELEASE.jar Your use of Spring Expression Language is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0 ("Apache License"). A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html. The source is available at the maven repository: http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework/spring-expression/4.1.6.RELEASE http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework/spring-core/4.1.6.RELEASE
Nebula
The plug-in is accompanied by a subset of Nebula Widgets, developed by the Eclipse Foundation. This plug-in includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.data plug-in org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.grid_1.0.0.201506151822.jar Your use of Nebula Widgets is subject to the terms and conditions of the the Eclipse Public License v1.0. A copy of the EPL is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html. The source is available at the Nebula web site at https://eclipse.org/nebula/downloads.php.
IT IS YOUR OBLIGATION TO READ AND ACCEPT ALL SUCH TERMS AND CONDITIONS PRIOR TO USE OF THIS CONTENT
